channel.title: Old Moparcraft images!
channel.description:
Let's do this! :D
I'll begin, if you don't have any then :(
http://i293.photobucket.com/albums/mm78/5frtgvhy/griefer.jpg

http://img818.imageshack.us/img818/9098/msminecraft3.png

Funny quotes:
[quote="Tom_BETA"]Some asshole poured 4 buckets of lava into my mine while I was in it.[/quote]
[quote="Moparisthebest, post:526, topic:375758"]Yes, it's down while I move it over and make it blazingly fast. Maybe another hour or so.[/quote]

item.title: Old Moparcraft images!
item.dc:creator: @triston001 triston001
item.description:
@triston001 wrote:

there isnt much group projects in w2 from what i see. its too isolated even with villages, but then again were still a 1.8.1 server without the pvp that alot of people apperently like.

Read full topic

item.title: Old Moparcraft images!
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

the old moparcraft was a place better than any server around the whole world now, just sayin’
all those grief clients and griefing teams, people used to enjoy playing together, building cool things and now??
GRIEF ALL OF THE BUILDINGS!

Read full topic

item.title: Old Moparcraft images!
item.dc:creator: @triston001 triston001
item.description:
@triston001 wrote:

woot. even tho i wasnt there, it seems like an actual mythical world or something tenfolds more advance than w2

Read full topic

item.title: Old Moparcraft images!
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:97, topic:424220”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=526877.msg3881865#msg3881865 date=1326082179]

[quote author=reyx7 link=topic=526877.msg3881850#msg3881850 date=1326080736]

I loved that tunnel from Akat to Haven. I remember trying to put railtracks in it, but no way to gain momentum existed (power rails didn’t exist yet). Who built the tunnel anyway?
[/quote]I did it lead from the underground fountain to our base, At first it wasn’t even meant to be a tunnel lol. I remember walking in it and having to relog 2-3times cause of chunk errors XD

Here is a test of your memory. What was the password to the chest under the fountain, and what items were found in it? For some strange reason I remember this…
[/quote]I have completely forgot honestly, I always had to ask Agl or someone else what it was lol.

9001

Iron swords, bread and dirt.
it was basically the raid chest.[/quote]See I thought it was something like “troll, lolol, etc”

Read full topic

item.title: Old Moparcraft images!
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:96, topic:424220”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=526877.msg3881850#msg3881850 date=1326080736]

[quote author=krackkid link=topic=526877.msg3881808#msg3881808 date=1326078638]

I loved that tunnel from Akat to Haven. I remember trying to put railtracks in it, but no way to gain momentum existed (power rails didn’t exist yet). Who built the tunnel anyway?
[/quote]I did it lead from the underground fountain to our base, At first it wasn’t even meant to be a tunnel lol. I remember walking in it and having to relog 2-3times cause of chunk errors XD

Here is a test of your memory. What was the password to the chest under the fountain, and what items were found in it? For some strange reason I remember this…
[/quote]I have completely forgot honestly, I always had to ask Agl or someone else what it was lol.[/quote]

9001

Iron swords, bread and dirt.
it was basically the raid chest.

Read full topic

item.title: Old Moparcraft images!
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:94, topic:424220”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=526877.msg3881755#msg3881755 date=1326076160]
I loved that tunnel from Akat to Haven. I remember trying to put railtracks in it, but no way to gain momentum existed (power rails didn’t exist yet). Who built the tunnel anyway?
[/quote]I did it lead from the underground fountain to our base, At first it wasn’t even meant to be a tunnel lol. I remember walking in it and having to relog 2-3times cause of chunk errors XD[/quote]

Here is a test of your memory. What was the password to the chest under the fountain, and what items were found in it? For some strange reason I remember this…

Read full topic

item.title: Old Moparcraft images!
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:90, topic:424220”]I loved that tunnel from Akat to Haven. I remember trying to put railtracks in it, but no way to gain momentum existed (power rails didn’t exist yet). Who built the tunnel anyway?[/quote]I did it lead from the underground fountain to our base, At first it wasn’t even meant to be a tunnel lol. I remember walking in it and having to relog 2-3times cause of chunk errors XD

item.title: Old Moparcraft images!
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:92, topic:424220”][quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=526877.msg3881763#msg3881763 date=1326076439]

I loved that tunnel from Akat to Haven. I remember trying to put railtracks in it, but no way to gain momentum existed (power rails didn’t exist yet). Who built the tunnel anyway?

we could have used booster rails but we were still noobs we started with tracks when we left akat
[/quote]
Boosters didn’t exist in 1.1_02. But there was that super long track to Viz’s with the cart glitch.[/quote]

ahh yes i was talking about the booster carts lol im so used to booster rails that im saying that for booster carts…

Read full topic

item.title: Old Moparcraft images!
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:

I loved that tunnel from Akat to Haven. I remember trying to put railtracks in it, but no way to gain momentum existed (power rails didn’t exist yet). Who built the tunnel anyway?
[/quote]

we could have used booster rails but we were still noobs we started with tracks when we left akat[/quote]
Boosters didn’t exist in 1.1_02. But there was that super long track to Viz’s with the cart glitch.

item.title: Old Moparcraft images!
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Travas, post:87, topic:424220”][quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=526877.msg3881190#msg3881190 date=1326046013]

[quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=526877.msg3881182#msg3881182 date=1326045725]

[quote author=krackkid link=topic=526877.msg3880523#msg3880523 date=1325996748]

looks nice, looks like a really nice place, wish world 2 was more like that…
[/quote]World 2, nor any world, will ever be able to replace the original moparcraft
[/quote]QFT <3

I MISS MY OLD ISOLATED HOME

i miss being a noob where i didnt know crap about redstone or good building
[/quote]i agree it was a lot more fun when you don’t know what you were doing, i remember the first time i played minecraft was on moparcraft…i had no idea what the fuck i was doing[/quote]
me 2

Then I looted someones diamond tools who died (At that time, diamonds were worth something…) and I think it was i vain i, cole, and krack, I was followin them back to their base when I think cole died, I looted them, said sweet and I was dead loael

THEY DIDNT TRUST ME :FOREVERALONE:

Read full topic
